      • appendXMLChildren

        public void appendXMLChildren(Node parent)
        Description copied from interface: XMLSerializable

        Append extra child elements to the given parent node to serialize the value of an object to an XML fragment. Methods of the XMLBuilder class are provided to help with this process.

        Specified by:
        appendXMLChildren in interface XMLSerializable
        Parameters:
        parent - XML parent element to append child nodes to.

      • getComment

        public String getComment()
        Description copied from interface: XMLSerializable

        Include a comment when serializing a value to XML. The comment will be inserted as the first child node of the element representing the class.

        Specified by:
        getComment in interface XMLSerializable
        Returns:
        Comment to add as the first child node of the element representing this class.
